channel.title: Npc help
channel.description:
in my slayer tower are crawling hands from lv 8
i start as lvl 3..
wit 10 hp
i wnet to slayer tower and attacked the crawling hand..
still 10 hp i had
he start wit 10 so i tought easy:(
but then he hitted 10 on me
later when i had 31 hp he hitted 29 on me
well.. help!! how ig et his max hit lower!!
